content: work 10 row in stockinette st needle 2 k to last 2 sts k2tog turn heel needle 3 knit row 1 sl 1 pwise k4 ssk k1 turn needle 4 ssk k to end 18 sts in the end row 2 sl 1 pwise p2 p2tog p1 turn foot row 3 sl 1 pwise k3 ssk divide the sts between three needles and knit 8 rds row 4 sl 1 pwise p3 p2tog 5 sts toes instep needle 1 ssk k4 the stitches are divided between four needles like needle 2 k1 k2tog ssk k1 this needle 3 k4 k2tog 14 sts needle 1 k5 knit one round without shaping needle 2 pick up and k5 along side of heel flap k1 needle 1 ssk k3 from leg sts needle 2 k2tog ssk needle 3 k7 needle 3 k3 k2tog 10 sts needle 4 k1 pick up and k5 along other side of heel knit one more round without shaping graft the toes flap 24 sts together and weave in the ends now shape the instep by working the following knit the 2nd boot the same way round three times hat cast on 24 sts in cream distribute over 4 needles and close to k in the round k 5 rds of garter st in cream starting with a purl round after the 5th round switch to red and continue in st st after 6 rds start decreasing k2tog the last two sts on each needle 20 sts k 2 rds then repeat the decreases again 16 sts k 2 rds then repeat de- creases again 12 sts k 3 rds then repeat decreases again 8 sts k 2 rds then cut yarn and thread through remaining sts and secure on the inside optionally rather than securing the red yarn tail on the inside bunch it up and wrap it repeatedly with the cream yarn to create a bobble at the top then fasten the tread on the inside scarf cast on 7 sts in green and k garter st until you reach the length you want the scarf to have bind off optionally use a small crochet hook to pull through short pieces of red and white yarn to make tassels pattern © eleonore von castelmur with the knitted from this pattern except for charity socks the socks are knit adapting the boot pattern cast on 15 sts purl one row then k for 16 row k the heel flap over 8 sts for 8 row in stockinette leaving the other 7 sts on a spare needle turn the heel row 1 sl 1 pwise k3 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 pwise p1 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 pwise k2 ssk row 4 sl 1 pwise p1 p2tog p1 4
